General.Name: Chia Yi Steel Co Ltd
General.Description: Chia Yi Steel Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells automobile casting parts in Asia, Europe, and the United States. It offers hydraulic, industrial, construction, and agricultural casting and machining products. The company also provides jack's parts, hydraulic valves, rolling rotors, carrier support, construction machinery parts, agriculture machinery parts, marine transmission parts, crane and hoist parts, engine parts, transmission parts, brake system parts, spring brackets, railroad bases, elevator sheaves, pumps, bolt machinery parts, and assembly of products. In addition, it offers machining, quality control, and casting production equipment; and computer-based mold flow simulation software, 3D printing of sand molds and sand cores, 3D printing of metal mold core, and FARO 3D scanning. The company was founded in 1974 and is based in Chiayi, Taiwan.
